author: Zhang, G; Xu, Y; Zhou, HF
adress: Tianjin Med Univ, Gen Hosp, Dept Otorhinolaryngol, Tianjin, Peoples R China
title: Esculetin Inhibits Proliferation, Invasion, and Migration of Laryngeal Cancer In Vitro and In Vivo by Inhibiting Janus Kinas (JAK)-Signal Transducer and Activator of Transcription-3 (STAT3) Activation
